name: 周至如
objective:
1. 電力系統品質項目與定義 2. 電壓降與停電 3. 電壓不平衡 4. 電力諧波 5. 頻率變動 6. 電壓閃爍 7. 暫態過壓 8. 電力品質監控
1. Terms and definitions of power systems quality2. Voltage sags and interruption3. Voltage unbalance4. Power harmonics5. Frequency deviation6. Voltage flicker7. Transient overvoltages8. Monitoring of power quality
schedule:
第 1 週:introduction, objects, important issues of power system
quality.
第 2 週:overview of existent power system crital power quality
problems and affections. 　
第 3 週:power outage problem survey , related indices evalutations
and affection factors and import parameters determinations.
第 4 週:causes and classification of power outage, improved
strategies and practical feasible measures for reducing power
outage.
第 5 週:fundamental theory of voltage variations on power system, root
causes to produce voltage variations, classification of
voltage variations.　
第 6 週:definitions for various indices of voltage variations and
their calculation.
第 7 週:analysis and simulation method for voltage variation with
respect to various types of voltage variations. affections
evaluations. 　
第 8 週:study of phase unbalance problems (fundamental theory, causes
and classification).
第 9 週：Review and midterm examination and report (期中考試)　
第 10 週:study of phase unbalance problems (analysis and simulation
methods, and indices definitions).
第 11 週:study of phase unbalance problems (affections assessment and
improved strategies).　
第 12 週:survey on waveform distortion problems: fundamental theory,
indices definitions, causes and analysis methods.
第 13 週:affections of power harmonics, transient and other type of
distortions of voltage and current waveforms.
第 14 週:local and international standard of power harmonics,
improved strategies and practical case studies.
第 15 週:planning and design of harmonic filters of practical
problems.
第 16 週:frequency variation issue on power system: causes study and
affections assessments. 　
第 17 週:the frequency control methods in utility and customer and
their availbility and investment evaluations.
第 18 週：Final examination and report (期末考)
scorePolicy:
期中考：30%  期末考：30%  平常成績：40%
註：平常成績包括：出席率，作業 (報告) 及課堂表現等.

課程對應SDGs指標: SDG9：產業創新與基礎設施（Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure）SDG12：負責任的消費與生產（Responsible Consumption and Production）
remarks: 本課程依進度進行授課，以課堂講解為主，輔以資料補充。教學要點如下：1. 電力系統品質探討議題及實務問題點之解說以建立學生基觀念。2. 理論分析、數學推導及模型之建立。 3. 電力系統品質分析方法及解題技巧，並能判讀系統特性及相關參數影響評估。
